description.value:
Unlock: When you reach 6th level overall you may take the ability below.

Your @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} cantrip ignores resistance to necrotic damage, and creatures that are immune to necrotic damage take half damage from it on a hit.

Additionally, over the course of a rest you can perform a ritual to merge a magical melee weapon with your shadow. At the end of the rest the weapon disappears and you attune to it, even if the item doesn’t require attunement. While you have a weapon merged with your shadow, weapons created by your @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} cantrip inherit all of the merged weapon’s magical properties. If the weapon has charges or limited use abilities, track their expenditure as a single pool—summoning your @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} multiple times does not grant extra uses of them. Creatures that closely inspect your shadow will notice that it appears to be holding the weapon while your @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} isn’t summoned or is banished.

A weapon merged with your shadow reappears a foot away from you when you die, your attunement to it ends, or you choose to merge a different weapon with your shadow. You can choose to end your attunement with a merged weapon over a rest.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
